steps.sql: SELECT m.id, m.name FROM materials m JOIN warehouse_material wm ON m.id = wm.material_id ORDER BY wm.left_number ASC LIMIT 1;
steps.description: Retrieve the material ID and name with the lowest remaining inventory

response:
Sure thing! Based on the latest inventory data, the material with the lowest remaining inventory is:

| Material ID | Material Name |
|-------------|---------------|
| 5           | Silk          |
